name: physicsbot
description: A Discord bot intended for usage with a physics discord server

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production CREDS=creds.yaml CONFIG=config.yaml TOKEN=$(cat token) COMMIT=$(git log --pretty='%h %s' -n1) babel-node src/index.js
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development CREDS=creds.yaml CONFIG=config.yaml TOKEN=$(cat token) COMMIT=$(git log --pretty='%h %s' -n1) babel-node src/index.js
scripts.test: TEST=true CREDS=creds.yaml CONFIG=config.yaml TOKEN=$(cat token) nyc --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register

author: ekzyis
